From Crises Response to Sustainability 💻🇺🇸

Feb 23, 2022

  • civictech
  • government
  • local government
  • technology

We are joined by Nava co-founders Rohan Bhobe and Sha Hwang for a conversation about their experiences responding to a crises and facing the challenges of building sustainable technology, processes, and partnerships afterward.
